channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy

item.title: CVE-2021-43206|2024-08-04T03:47:13.641Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortios%2C%20fortiproxy
item.description: A server-generated error message containing sensitive information in Fortinet FortiOS 7.0.0 through 7.0.3, 6.4.0 through 6.4.8, 6.2.x, 6.0.x and FortiProxy 7.0.0 through 7.0.1, 2.0.x allows malicious webservers to retrieve a web proxy's client username and IP via same origin HTTP requests triggering proxy-generated HTTP status codes pages.
